comments:
Build 20011108

I had a workbench with the following perspectives (all in one window):

- Default team perspective
- Custom java perspective with search & task list in fast views
- Custom java perspective with search, task & console in fast view
- Standard debug perspective

Steps to recreate
1) Go to the team perspective
2) Close the workbench
3) Open the Workbench
4) Immediately Close Workbench

Internal Error:
